name: The cube game
description:
I programmed this, but I did get help from this tutorial, as this is my first Unity game ever. This game will be available on mobile soon as well. If you want to support me, all you have to do is subscribe to my 2 YouTube channels! It helps me a lot and would make my whole day! Links: http://www.tiny.cc/sub2gc and http://www.tiny.cc/sub2techtalk. if you did, thanks, I really appreciate it. Enjoy the game!

Music: https://ericskiff.com/music/

Controls: A and D to move! Have fun!
